title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

ai.summary: Based on the available description… Daniel Tom, 31, runs Bay Area Sanitation, which operates nearly 2,000 portable toilets serving construction sites and events across the San Francisco Bay Area. The company reported $4.3 million in total income in 2025.
bullets: Owner: Daniel Tom, 31
Company: Bay Area Sanitation
Fleet size: almost 2,000 portable toilets
Service area: construction sites and events across the San Francisco Bay Area
2025 total income: $4.3 million
takeaways: A regional supplier with ~2,000 units indicates strong local capacity for on-site sanitation needs during data center construction or maintenance.
Factor multi-million-dollar recurring service contracts (sanitation/waste management) into construction and operations budgets.
Advance scheduling and contracting with large local vendors can reduce site disruptions during phased builds or events.
Pre-qualify regional service providers early to ensure reliable logistics and compliance during project execution.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, route planning is made easy as Jo discovers the power of Copilot Groups. The short piece highlights Copilot Groups within Microsoft Copilot and frames it as an AI-driven aid for planning routes.
bullets: Route planning made easy
Highlights Copilot Groups feature
Follows Jo discovering the tool's power
Positions Copilot within Microsoft Copilot
Includes hashtags: #copilot #microsoftcopilot #ai
takeaways: If your operations involve route planning, Copilot Groups could simplify coordination of routing tasks across teams.
Easier route planning may help reduce dispatch complexity and support faster field responses.
Evaluate Copilot Groups for potential efficiency gains in planning and crew logistics where AI-assisted routing is applicable.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AI in audit is presented as a current, everyday set of tools that help audit teams with repetitive tasks, large-scale data analysis, and evidence-based decision-making. In the KPMG ON AIR podcast Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska describe practical AI applications (Transaction Scoring, Clara AI, KPMG Clara), client benefits, the shift to full-population analysis, and related skills, security and regulatory considerations.
bullets: AI tools (Transaction Scoring, Clara AI) enable analysis of full populations and automated, conversational assistance.
KPMG Clara platform supports real-time audit management and Clara for Clients improves client communication.
Shift from sampling to full-population analysis driven by technology.
AI aids documentation and disclosure analysis, increasing efficiency and data-driven decisions.
Implementation challenges include auditor adaptation, data security and evolving regulation.
takeaways: Expect audits to leverage full-population analytics—ensure your data is accessible, well-structured and auditable.
Prioritize data security and compliance, since AI-enabled audits raise regulatory and privacy considerations.
Prepare for more real-time interaction with auditors (platforms like KPMG Clara) by enabling secure, collaborative channels.
Invest in internal skills and processes to support AI-driven audit workflows and smoother auditor collaboration.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and includes support for NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The 3D real-time strategy RPG trailer was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode, and the game casts the player as the Endministrator exploring Talos-II.
bullets: Arknights: Endfield is a newly launched 3D real-time strategy RPG.
The release features NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation (MFG).
Trailer captured on GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra with DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
Official game site and multiple social channels are provided for more info.
NVIDIA published a feature post linking DLSS 4 integration details.
takeaways: DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is being adopted in new titles—plan for GPU driver and API compatibility testing when deploying game workloads.
High-resolution captures in the trailer used an RTX 5080, indicating that content creation/QA workflows may target top-tier GPUs for 4K assets.
Infrastructure planning should account for GPUs that support DLSS 4/MFG to enable AI-driven upscaling and frame generation in production or demonstration pipelines.
